Class CentroidCluster

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.qtplaf.library.ai.learning.clustering.Cluster
      • com.qtplaf.library.ai.learning.clustering.centroid.CentroidCluster

  • public class CentroidCluster
extends Cluster
    A cluster with centroid and distance metrics.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
